headline: Micron Technology, Inc. (MU): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Micron Technology, Inc. (MU) on Substack by Oliver | MMMT Wealth. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on MU. Micron Technology, Inc. (MU)’s share was trading at $70.21 as of April 22nd. MU’s trailing and forward P/E were 16.80 and 10.28 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Micron […]
